title: Claim Work Response
description: Response to an attempt to claim tasks for a worker to process.

tasks.description:
List of task claims, may be empty if no tasks was claimed, in which case
the worker should sleep a tiny bit before polling again.

runId.description: `run-id` assigned to this run of the task

workerGroup.description: Identifier for the worker-group within which this run started.

workerId.description: Identifier for the worker executing this run.

takenUntil.description:
Time at which the run expires and is resolved as `exception`,
with reason `claim-expired` if the run haven't been reclaimed.
